name: fresh-service-desk-msp
label: Fresh Service Desk MSP
description: Fresh Service Desk MSP is a cloud-based service desk and IT service management (ITSM) platform designed to streamline service management for businesses. It offers a range of features including incident management, problem management, change management, asset management, and more. Freshservice provides a user-friendly interface for managing service requests, automating workflows, tracking assets, and generating reports. Its multi-tenant architecture ensures data segregation and security for different clients. The connector for Freshservice enables automated actions such as creating, updating, deleting, and closing tickets, enhancing the efficiency of service delivery for managed service providers.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Fresh Service Desk MSP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Fresh Service Desk MSP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Specify the API key that is configured for your account to access the Fresh Service Desk MSP endpoint.
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key that is configured for your account to access the Fresh Service Desk MSP endpoint.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Specify the password that is configured for your account to access the Fresh Service Desk MSP endpoint.
fields.tooltip: Specify the password that is configured for your account to access the Fresh Service Desk MSP endpoint.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Ticket
operations.description: Creates a ticket in Fresh Service Desk MSP based on the requester, subject, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Specify the subject of the ticket request that you want to create in Fresh Service Desk MSP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the subject of the ticket request that you want to create in Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: Email
parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Specify email address  of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Fresh Service Desk MSP, it will be added as a new contact.
parameters.tooltip: Specify email address  of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Fresh Service Desk MSP, it will be added as a new contact.

parameters.title: CC Email
parameters.name: cc_emails
parameters.description: Specify email address  of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Fresh Service Desk MSP, it will be added as a new contact.
parameters.tooltip: Specify email address  of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Fresh Service Desk MSP, it will be added as a new contact.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of the ticket request to create in Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: Priorities
parameters.name: priorities
parameters.tooltip: Select the priority of the ticket request to create in Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the description of the ticket request to create in Fresh Service Desk MSP.
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the description of the ticket request to create in Fresh Service Desk MSP.

operations.title: Get Ticket By ID
operations.description: Retrieves details of specific tickets from  Fresh Service Desk MSP on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket ID
parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: Specify id  of the ticket for which you want to retrieve ticket details from Fresh Service Desk MSP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify id  of the ticket for which you want to retrieve ticket details from Fresh Service Desk MSP.

operations.title: Delete Ticket By ID
operations.description: Delete of specific tickets from  Fresh Service Desk MSP on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket ID
parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: Specify id  of the ticket for which you want to retrieve ticket details from Fresh Service Desk MSP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify id  of the ticket for which you want to retrieve ticket details from Fresh Service Desk MSP.

operations.title: Update Ticket
operations.description: Update a ticket in Fresh Service Desk MSP based on the ticket id and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket ID
parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify id of the ticket for which you want to retrieve ticket details from Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Specify the subject of the ticket request that you want to update in Fresh Service Desk MSP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the subject of the ticket request that you want to update in Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description of the ticket request that you want to update in Fresh Service Desk MSP.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the ticket request that you want to update in Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: Email
parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Specify email address  of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Fresh Service Desk MSP, it will be added as a new contact.
parameters.tooltip: Specify email address  of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Fresh Service Desk MSP, it will be added as a new contact.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of the ticket request for which you want to create tickets from Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: Priorities
parameters.name: priorities
parameters.tooltip: Select the priority of the ticket request for which you want to retrieve tickets from from Fresh Service Desk MSP.

parameters.title: File IRI or Attachment IRI

Attachment ID.title: Attachment ID
Attachment ID.description: Specify the attachment ID of the file in the FortiSOAR Attachments module.
Attachment ID.name: value

File IRI.title: File IRI
File IRI.description: Specify the File IRI of the file in the FortiSOAR Attachments module.
File IRI.name: value

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Specify the file to add as an attachment to the specified Jira ticket. You can select from the following options: Attachment ID: Specify the attachment ID of the file in the FortiSOAR Attachments module. File IRI: Specify the File IRI of the file in the FortiSOAR Attachments module.

operations.title: Filter Tickets By Query
operations.description: Retrieves list of tickets matching the specified query.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify query to filter ticket request for which you want to retrieve list of tickets from Fresh Service Desk MSP.
